2091190.name: Path
2091190.description:
The PATH is a minimalist puzzle game and contains 50 levels with increasing difficulty. There is just you, arrows and a set of puzzle game mechanics based on logic. You have to choose the right path to advance to the next challenge.

In the game we don't have ads, time restriction or scores. Enjoy all levels while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack.

  • Originals Music and Sound Effects
  • No text, suitable for all languages
  • Use only the mouse (point and click)
  • Mental work out and lots of fun
  • No time, ads, pressure or scores
  • Each level is handcrafted made and unique
2091190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
